pullrequest.title: Require DART 4.1 and fix deprecation warnings

content.html:
@hsu is not seeing these delays on his 12.04 machine, though I am seeing huge delays on my 14.04 machine. I'm betting that it's related to different compilation flags being used for the dart debs on each platform. @_jrivero_

UPDATE: https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/bloom/pull/278 may be relevant

also https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/buildfarm/issues/197
